document.full_text: lead emissions from a battery plant in eastern china have poisoned more than 100 villagers, including 35 children, state news agency xinhua reported on friday, the latest in a string of heavy metal pollution cases in the country.
document.title: china battery plant poisons more than 100 villagers: report
lines_and_colors: lead emissions from a battery plant in eastern china have poisoned more than 100 villagers, including 35 children, state news agency xinhua reported on friday, the latest in a string of heavy metal pollution cases in the country.
